entry.title: https://github.com/DaoCloud/public-image-mirror
entry.content: 很多镜像都在国外。比如 gcr 。国内下载很慢，需要加速。致力于提供连接全世界的稳定可靠安全的容器镜像服务。

entry.title: https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps
entry.content: This repository started out as a learning in public project for myself and has now become a structured learning map for many in the community. We have 3 years under our belt covering all things DevOps, including Principles, Processes, Tooling and Use Cases surrounding this vast topic.

entry.title: https://github.com/angristan/openvpn-install
entry.content: Set up your own OpenVPN server on Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, CentOS, Arch Linux and more

entry.title: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code
entry.content: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

entry.title: https://github.com/bin456789/reinstall
entry.content: 一键DD/重装脚本 (One-click reinstall OS on VPS)

entry.title: https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm
entry.content: Node Version Manager - POSIX-compliant bash script to manage multiple active node.js versions

entry.title: https://github.com/sabamdarif/termux-desktop
entry.content: Install a full Linux desktop environment on your Android device with Termux X11 ( VNC optional) and also enable hardware acceleration

entry.title: https://github.com/winapps-org/winapps
entry.content: Run Windows apps such as Microsoft Office/Adobe in Linux (Ubuntu/Fedora) and GNOME/KDE as if they were a part of the native OS, including Nautilus integration. Hard fork of https://github.com/Fmstrat/winapps/
